title: Self-Directed Learning Competency Development Program for Online Learning Success

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A course for undergraduate science students to systematically acquire self-directed learning strategies in accessible online environments and cultivate practical application skills through project-based learning

learning_goals: Learners establish weekly learning plans in an online learning environment and achieve an implementation rate of over 80%
Learners exchange feedback with peers at least three times using digital collaboration tools to solve science-related PBL tasks
Learners evaluate online learning materials that are at least 90% accessible, including screen-reader-compatible content and captioned videos
By the end of the course, learners improve time management and online resource utilization competencies by 30% compared to pre-assessment through self-reflective portfolios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
